translations: n.果汁冰糕；冰冻果子露；加果汁的冰水

phrs.translation: 雪葩, 雪芭, 果汁冰糕
芒果雪芭, 芒果冰沙
柠檬雪葩, 柠檬雪芭
青柠雪葩, 酸橙雪酪, 酸柑冰砂
桑果雪芭, 无忧果冰沙
百香雪酪, 水果冰沙

sentences.sentence: Freeze 100% whole fruit juice in small cups to make sorbet.
sentences.translation: 用100%纯鲜榨冰果汁做成水果刨冰。

sentences.sentence: Scream for sorbet Indulge in chocolate sorbet instead of chocolate ice cream. Saves 125
sentences.translation: 把巧克力冰淇淋换车巧克力雪糕.

sentences.sentence: Serve the mango sorbet in bowls, or scoop into ice cream cones (as pictured), and ENJOY!
sentences.translation: 把芒果冰沙舀到碗里，或者放进冰淇淋蛋卷筒里，开始享受美味吧！
